name: Bible Riddle
description:
Can you solve the riddle? Some are easy, some are hard. Is the riddle too hard? No problem, just tap the hint button in the upper right corner.
You earn 1 hint point for every 5 levels you complete.

This game is designed for Jehovah's Witnesses.The first ten riddles are easy enough, but they get harder, so use your hint points wisely. All hints refer to a scripture where you can find the answer. When you have to guess a year, the hint will refer to the 'All Scripture Is Inspired' book published by Jehovah's Witnesses (only available in print or on the official cd-rom 'Watchtower Library').

Available in Danish, English, and Polish.
